name: 0x06-unittests_in_js
description: # Requirements All of your code will be executed on Ubuntu 18.04 using Node 12.x.x Allowed editors: vi, vim, emacs, Visual Studio Code All your files should end with a new line A README.md file, at the root of the folder of the project, is mandatory Your code should use the js extension When running every test with npm run test *.test.js, everything should pass correctly without any warning or error
